Interface implemented by fragments that contain encoded instructions and/or data.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h/#l00151">151</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.

### getBundlePadding() {#a890529a26c57ca69093313b4ca758eb7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint8&#95;t llvm::MCEncodedFragment::getBundlePadding () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Get the padding size that must be inserted before this fragment.

Used for bundling. By default, no padding is inserted. Note that padding size is restricted to 8 bits. This is an optimization to reduce the amount of space used for each fragment. In practice, larger padding should never be required.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h/#l00159">159</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getSubtargetInfo() {#a2c97dba695c5b5fa2bcc39c47c3b0762}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const MCSubtargetInfo &#42; llvm::MCEncodedFragment::getSubtargetInfo () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Retrieve the MCSubTargetInfo in effect when the instruction was encoded.

Guaranteed to be non-null if <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment/#acd02e61b262530ebe5c9a27ac0a0a693">hasInstructions()</a> == true

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h/#l00167">167</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.

### setBundlePadding() {#a74ca9081add78d66b5c6ebfe0f3d2b28}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::MCEncodedFragment::setBundlePadding (uint8&#95;t N)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the padding size for this fragment.

By default it&#39;s a no-op, and only some fragments have a meaningful implementation.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h/#l00163">163</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcfragment-h">MCFragment.h</a>.
